node_info.description: Starts the workflow when SeaTable events occur
node_info.name: SeaTable Trigger
node_info.subtitle: ={{$parameter["event"]}}

properties.name: searchColumn
properties.description: Select the column to be searched. Not all column types are supported for search. Choose from the list, or specify a name using an expression.

properties.name: searchTerm
properties.description: What to look for?

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the search ignores case sensitivity (true). Otherwise, it distinguishes between uppercase and lowercase characters.

options.name: insensitive
options.description: Whether the search ignores case sensitivity (true). Otherwise, it distinguishes between uppercase and lowercase characters.

options.name: wildcard
options.description: Whether the search only results perfect matches (true). Otherwise, it finds a row even if the search value is part of a string (false).

options.name: simple
options.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

options.name: convert
options.description: Whether to return the column keys (false) or the column names (true)

properties.name: fieldsToSend
properties.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns
options.description: Use when node input properties match destination column names

options.name: Define Below for Each Column
options.description: Set the value for each destination column

properties.name: inputsToIgnore
properties.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

properties.name: columnsUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: columnName
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.displayName: Hint: Link, files, images or digital signatures have to be added separately.
properties.name: notice
tableName
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: rowId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: apply_default
properties.description: Whether to use the column default values to populate new rows during creation (only available for normal backend)

properties.displayName: In this mode, make sure the incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in SeaTable. (Use an "Edit Fields" node before this node to change them if required.)
properties.name: notice
inputsToIgnore
properties.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

properties.name: columnsUi
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: columnName
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: bigdata
properties.description: Whether write to Big Data backend (true) or not (false). True requires the activation of the Big Data backend in the base.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a new row

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a new row

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a row

options.name: Get
options.description: Get the content of a row

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many rows from a table or a table view

options.name: Lock
options.description: Lock a row to prevent further changes

options.name: Search
options.description: Search one or multiple rows

options.name: Unlock
options.description: Remove the lock from a row

options.name: Update
options.description: Update the content of a row

properties.name: viewName
properties.description: The name of SeaTable view to access, or specify by using an expression. Provide it in the way "col.name:::col.type".

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a snapshot of the base

options.name: Snapshot
options.description: Create a snapshot of the base

options.name: Metadata
options.description: Get the complete metadata of the base

options.name: Collaborator
options.description: Get the username from the email or name of a collaborator
options.action: Get username from email or name

properties.displayName: Name or email of the collaborator
properties.name: searchString
properties.description: SeaTable identifies users with a unique username like 244b43hr6fy54bb4afa2c2cb7369d244@auth.local. Get this username from an email or the name of a collaborator.
properties.placeholder: Enter the name or the email or the collaborator

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Get the public URL from asset path
properties.action: Get the public URL from asset path

options.name: Public URL

options.action: Get the public URL from asset path

options.name: Upload
options.description: Add a file/image to an existing row

properties.name: tableName
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify a name using an expression

properties.name: uploadColumn
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify the name using an expression

properties.name: rowId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: dataPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be written

properties.name: linkColumn
properties.description: Choose from the list of specify the Link Column by using an expression. You have to provide it in the way "column_name:::link_id:::other_table_id".

properties.displayName: Row ID From the Source Table
properties.name: linkColumnSourceId
properties.description: Provide the row ID of table you selected

properties.displayName: Row ID From the Target Table
properties.name: linkColumnTargetId
properties.description: Provide the row ID of table you want to link

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a link between two rows in a link column
